snippet: While other college assistant coaches tend to move around to new jobs, Gary Campbell has stayed at Oregon for three decades, in part because of his son.
abstract: Profile of Oregon running backs coach Gary Campbell, longest-tenured assistant coach at one university in major college football; Campbell's primary reason for staying at Oregon for three decades is his son Bryan, who suffers from a severe type of spinal muscular atrophy.
lead_paragraph: While other college assistant coaches tend to move around to new jobs, Gary Campbell has stayed at Oregon for three decades, in part because of his son.

headline.seo: Gary Campbell Keeps Coaching Oregon’s Running Backs
headline.main: Staying at Oregon, and Happy About It
headline.print_headline: Staying Put, And Happy About It
